articles.title: US clamps down on AI chip export drawing pushback - BBC.com
articles.description: The new rules are intended to make sure the "the world's AI runs on American rails", and stays out of the hands of "malicious actors", say officials.
articles.content: The US is moving to impose tough new restrictions on the export of advanced computer chips and other artificial intelligence (AI) technology to dozens of countries - not just the handful it has long … [+3269 chars]

articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Almost Half of Americans Over 55 Face Dementia Risk - Neuroscience News
articles.description: New research finds that the lifetime risk of dementia after age 55 in Americans is 42%, significantly higher than previous estimates.
articles.content: Summary: New research finds that the lifetime risk of dementia after age 55 in Americans is 42%, significantly higher than previous estimates. Women face a higher risk (48%) than men (35%) due to the… [+8134 chars]
